name: Glitch Hop
description:
Glitch Hop was created in 20 days for AmalgamAsh's

RPG Maker MV3D Fall 2020 Game Jam.

This is just the concept of a puzzle game, where the player has two bots to control.  I could do a lot more with this idea and I might even continue the project after the game jam. We'll just have to see (:

Any feedback would be great!

Credits-
